description: “the 44: the men” features the most complete collection of information on the 44 famous men who have taken turns guiding the United States for more than two centuries – the Presidents of the United States. From President George Washington to President Barack Obama, you will find Mini Biographies, even including a link to the web at the end to learn more! Each president also has a place with Fast Facts, where you can learn their Birth and Death dates, Vice-Presidents, Political-Party, Nickname (where available), First-Lady, Famous Quote(s), and so much more! You will even see how many states were added to the USA during their term, what their names are, and the year(s) they were added. Complete with 44 high resolution photographs, and their most famous quotes, you'll never need anything more! Download today for only $0.99! For more information, just go to our home page!
